org.apache.flink.runtime.execution

  • org.apache.flink.runtime.execution使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    ExecutionState
    An enumeration of all states that a task can be in during its execution.
  • org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    ExecutionState
    An enumeration of all states that a task can be in during its execution.
  • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.partition使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    CancelTaskException
    Thrown to trigger a canceling of the executing task.
  • org.apache.flink.runtime.jobgraph.tasks使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    Environment
    The Environment gives the code executed in a task access to the task's properties (such as name, parallelism), the configurations, the data stream readers and writers, as well as the various components that are provided by the TaskManager, such as memory manager, I/O manager, ...
  • org.apache.flink.runtime.state使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    Environment
    The Environment gives the code executed in a task access to the task's properties (such as name, parallelism), the configurations, the data stream readers and writers, as well as the various components that are provided by the TaskManager, such as memory manager, I/O manager, ...
  • org.apache.flink.runtime.state.filesystem使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    Environment
    The Environment gives the code executed in a task access to the task's properties (such as name, parallelism), the configurations, the data stream readers and writers, as well as the various components that are provided by the TaskManager, such as memory manager, I/O manager, ...
  • org.apache.flink.runtime.taskmanager使用的org.apache.flink.runtime.execution中的类 
    类和说明
    Environment
    The Environment gives the code executed in a task access to the task's properties (such as name, parallelism), the configurations, the data stream readers and writers, as well as the various components that are provided by the TaskManager, such as memory manager, I/O manager, ...
    ExecutionState
    An enumeration of all states that a task can be in during its execution.
